attrs.script:
#Install NGINX
sudo hostnamectl set-hostname "@@{name[calm_array_index]}@@"

sudo yum install -y epel-release
sudo yum install -y nginx
sudo systemctl start nginx
sudo firewall-cmd --permanent --zone=public --add-service=http 
sudo firewall-cmd --permanent --zone=public --add-service=https
sudo firewall-cmd --reload
sudo systemctl enable nginx


#Install Git
sudo yum -y install git-core
sudo yum update -y nss curl libcurl


#Temporarily Disable SE
sudo setenforce 0
sudo sed -i 's/permissive/disabled/' /etc/sysconfig/selinux


#Install Uptick Program
sudo mkdir -p /var/www/projects/
#sudo mkdir -p /var/www/html
sudo sed -i 's/\/usr\/share\/nginx\/html/\/var\/www\/projects\/uptick/g' /etc/nginx/nginx.conf
cd /var/www/projects/
sudo git clone https://github.com/mjastad/uptick.git
#sudo cp -r /var/www/projects/uptick/. /var/www/html
sudo chmod -R 755 /var/www/*


#Modify js/data.js to point to NODEJS
echo @@{NODEJS.address}@@
sudo sed -i 's/NODE_SERVER_IP_ADDRESS/@@{NODEJS.address}@@/g' /var/www/projects/uptick/js/data.js


#Start Services
systemctl enable nginx
systemctl stop nginx
systemctl start nginx

action_list.name: action_install

action_list.description: System action for creating an application
action_list.name: action_create

action_list.description: System action for uninstalling an application

attrs.script:
#Install NodeJS
sudo yum install -y epel-release
curl --silent --location https://rpm.nodesource.com/setup_9.x | sudo bash -
sudo yum install -y nodejs

sudo hostnamectl set-hostname "@@{name}@@"

#Install Git
sudo yum -y install git-core
sudo yum update -y nss curl libcurl


#Temporarily Disable SE
sudo setenforce 0
sudo sed -i 's/permissive/disabled/' /etc/sysconfig/selinux


#Disable Firewall
systemctl disable firewalld
systemctl stop firewalld
systemctl status firewalld


#Install Uptick Program
sudo mkdir -p /var/www/projects/
cd /var/www/projects/
sudo git clone https://github.com/mjastad/uptick.git
sudo chmod -R 755 /var/www/*


#Build Node Package
cd /var/www/projects/uptick
npm build


#Edit dbConfig.js to replace mysql with mssql
sudo sed -i 's/mysql/mssql/g' /var/www/projects/uptick/config/dbConfig.js


#Edit mssqlconfig.js to replace sql server, port
sudo sed -i 's/DB_SERVER_IPADDRESS/10.21.39.94/g' /var/www/projects/uptick/config/mssqlConfig.js
sudo sed -i 's/DATABASE_NAME/Uptick/g' /var/www/projects/uptick/config/mssqlConfig.js
sudo sed -i 's/DB_USER/sa/g' /var/www/projects/uptick/config/mssqlConfig.js
sudo sed -i 's/sa_PASSWORD/nutanix\/4u/g' /var/www/projects/uptick/config/mssqlConfig.js
sudo sed -i 's/PORT/1433/g' /var/www/projects/uptick/config/mssqlConfig.js
#chmod -R 755 /var/www/projects/uptick/

#Start Node Server
#sudo node /var/www/projects/uptick/server.js

sudo npm install -g forever
cd /var/www/projects/uptick
forever start server.js

action_list.name: action_install

action_list.description: System action for creating an application
action_list.name: action_create

action_list.description: System action for uninstalling an application

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -ex

sudo setenforce 0
sudo sed -i 's/permissive/disabled/' /etc/sysconfig/selinux

sudo hostnamectl set-hostname "@@{name}@@"

port=80
sudo yum update -y
sudo yum install -y haproxy


echo "global
  log 127.0.0.1 local0
  log 127.0.0.1 local1 notice
  maxconn 4096
  quiet
  user haproxy
  group haproxy
defaults
  log     global
  mode    http
  retries 3
  timeout client 50s
  timeout connect 5s
  timeout server 50s
  option dontlognull
  option httplog
  option redispatch
  balance  roundrobin
# Set up application listeners here.
listen stats 0.0.0.0:8080
  mode http
  log global
  stats enable
  stats hide-version
  stats refresh 30s
  stats show-node
  stats uri /stats
listen admin
  bind 127.0.0.1:22002
  mode http
  stats uri /
#frontend http
frontend www
  maxconn 2000
  bind 0.0.0.0:80
  default_backend servers-http
backend servers-http" | sudo tee /etc/haproxy/haproxy.cfg

sudo sed -i 's/server host-/#server host-/g' /etc/haproxy/haproxy.cfg

hosts=$(echo "@@{NGINX.address}@@" | sed 's/^,//' | sed 's/,$//' | tr "," "\n")

for host in $hosts
do
   echo "  server host-${host} ${host}:${port} weight 1 maxconn 100 check" | sudo tee -a /etc/haproxy/haproxy.cfg
done

sudo systemctl daemon-reload
sudo systemctl enable haproxy
sudo systemctl restart haproxy

#Disable Firewall
systemctl stop firewalld
systemctl disable firewalld
systemctl status firewalld

action_list.name: action_install

action_list.description: System action for creating an application
action_list.name: action_create

action_list.description: System action for uninstalling an application

attrs.script:
#Install NGINX
sudo hostnamectl set-hostname "@@{name[calm_array_index]}@@"

sudo yum install -y epel-release
sudo yum install -y nginx
sudo systemctl start nginx
sudo firewall-cmd --permanent --zone=public --add-service=http 
sudo firewall-cmd --permanent --zone=public --add-service=https
sudo firewall-cmd --reload
sudo systemctl enable nginx


#Install Git
sudo yum -y install git-core
sudo yum update -y nss curl libcurl


#Temporarily Disable SE
sudo setenforce 0
sudo sed -i 's/permissive/disabled/' /etc/sysconfig/selinux


#Install Uptick Program
sudo mkdir -p /var/www/projects/
#sudo mkdir -p /var/www/html
sudo sed -i 's/\/usr\/share\/nginx\/html/\/var\/www\/projects\/uptick/g' /etc/nginx/nginx.conf
cd /var/www/projects/
sudo git clone https://github.com/mjastad/uptick.git
#sudo cp -r /var/www/projects/uptick/. /var/www/html
sudo chmod -R 755 /var/www/*


#Modify js/data.js to point to NODEJS
echo @@{NODEJS.address}@@
sudo sed -i 's/NODE_SERVER_IP_ADDRESS/@@{NODEJS.address}@@/g' /var/www/projects/uptick/js/data.js


#Start Services
systemctl enable nginx
systemctl stop nginx
systemctl start nginx

#Install NodeJS
sudo yum install -y epel-release
curl --silent --location https://rpm.nodesource.com/setup_9.x | sudo bash -
sudo yum install -y nodejs

sudo hostnamectl set-hostname "@@{name}@@"

#Install Git
sudo yum -y install git-core
sudo yum update -y nss curl libcurl


#Temporarily Disable SE
sudo setenforce 0
sudo sed -i 's/permissive/disabled/' /etc/sysconfig/selinux


#Disable Firewall
systemctl disable firewalld
systemctl stop firewalld
systemctl status firewalld


#Install Uptick Program
sudo mkdir -p /var/www/projects/
cd /var/www/projects/
sudo git clone https://github.com/mjastad/uptick.git
sudo chmod -R 755 /var/www/*


#Build Node Package
cd /var/www/projects/uptick
npm build


#Edit dbConfig.js to replace mysql with mssql
sudo sed -i 's/mysql/mssql/g' /var/www/projects/uptick/config/dbConfig.js


#Edit mssqlconfig.js to replace sql server, port
sudo sed -i 's/DB_SERVER_IPADDRESS/10.21.39.94/g' /var/www/projects/uptick/config/mssqlConfig.js
sudo sed -i 's/DATABASE_NAME/Uptick/g' /var/www/projects/uptick/config/mssqlConfig.js
sudo sed -i 's/DB_USER/sa/g' /var/www/projects/uptick/config/mssqlConfig.js
sudo sed -i 's/sa_PASSWORD/nutanix\/4u/g' /var/www/projects/uptick/config/mssqlConfig.js
sudo sed -i 's/PORT/1433/g' /var/www/projects/uptick/config/mssqlConfig.js
#chmod -R 755 /var/www/projects/uptick/

#Start Node Server
#sudo node /var/www/projects/uptick/server.js

sudo npm install -g forever
cd /var/www/projects/uptick
forever start server.js

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

sudo setenforce 0
sudo sed -i 's/permissive/disabled/' /etc/sysconfig/selinux

sudo hostnamectl set-hostname "@@{name}@@"

port=80
sudo yum update -y
sudo yum install -y haproxy


echo "global
  log 127.0.0.1 local0
  log 127.0.0.1 local1 notice
  maxconn 4096
  quiet
  user haproxy
  group haproxy
defaults
  log     global
  mode    http
  retries 3
  timeout client 50s
  timeout connect 5s
  timeout server 50s
  option dontlognull
  option httplog
  option redispatch
  balance  roundrobin
# Set up application listeners here.
listen stats 0.0.0.0:8080
  mode http
  log global
  stats enable
  stats hide-version
  stats refresh 30s
  stats show-node
  stats uri /stats
listen admin
  bind 127.0.0.1:22002
  mode http
  stats uri /
#frontend http
frontend www
  maxconn 2000
  bind 0.0.0.0:80
  default_backend servers-http
backend servers-http" | sudo tee /etc/haproxy/haproxy.cfg

sudo sed -i 's/server host-/#server host-/g' /etc/haproxy/haproxy.cfg

hosts=$(echo "@@{NGINX.address}@@" | sed 's/^,//' | sed 's/,$//' | tr "," "\n")

for host in $hosts
do
   echo "  server host-${host} ${host}:${port} weight 1 maxconn 100 check" | sudo tee -a /etc/haproxy/haproxy.cfg
done

sudo systemctl daemon-reload
sudo systemctl enable haproxy
sudo systemctl restart haproxy

#Disable Firewall
systemctl stop firewalld
systemctl disable firewalld
systemctl status firewalld
